Token.Abstract: For classic computer science data structures.
For inspecting code and writing to logs in debug builds.
Only writes to the log when DEBUG is defined.
Write the containing method's name to the log using NIDPRINT.
Assertions that only fire when DEBUG is defined.
Only writes to the log if condition is satisified.
The maximum log level to output for Nimbus debug logs.
Only writes to the log if NIMaxLogLevel >= NILOGLEVEL_ERROR.
Only writes to the log if NIMaxLogLevel >= NILOGLEVEL_WARNING.
Only writes to the log if NIMaxLogLevel >= NILOGLEVEL_INFO.
For dealing with device orientations.
For use in shouldAutorotateToInterfaceOrientation:
Returns the application's current interface orientation.
For filling in gaps in Apple's Foundation framework.
For manipulating CGRects.
Modifies only the right and bottom edges of a CGRect.
Modifies only the top and left edges of a CGRect.
Add the insets to a CGRect - equivalent to padding in CSS.
For manipulating NSRange.
Create an NSRange object from a CFRange object.
For storing and accessing objects in memory.
Nimbus' Core library contains many often used utilities.
For showing network activity in the device's status bar.
Increment the number of active network tasks.
Decrement the number of active network tasks.
Enable network activity debugging.
Disable network activity debugging.
For testing whether a collection is of a certain type and is non-empty.
Tests if an object is a non-nil array which is not empty.
Tests if an object is a non-nil set which is not empty.
Tests if an object is a non-nil string which is not empty.
For collections that don't retain their objects.
Creates a mutable array which does not retain references to the objects it contains.
Creates a mutable dictionary which does not retain references to the values it contains.
Creates a mutable set which does not retain references to the values it contains.
For creating standard system paths.
Create a path with the given bundle and the relative path appended.
Create a path with the documents directory and the relative path appended.
For generating code where methods can't be used.
Mark a method or property as deprecated to the compiler.
Force a category to be loaded when an app starts up.
Release and assign nil to an object.
For modifying class implementations at runtime.
Swap two class instance method implementations.
Swap two class method implementations.
For checking SDK feature availibility.

x/y, width/height are in percent coordinates.
The size of the image to be displayed on the screen.
When this is enabled, the final image is cropped to fit the display size perfectly.
Determines how to resize and crop the image.

The number of objects stored in this cache.

The padding for the button.

Called when the user taps and releases a launcher button.

The designated initializer.
Convenience method for creating a launcher item details object.
The title for the launcher button.
The path to the launcher image.
A launcher view that simulates iOS' home screen launcher functionality.
Reload the launcher data.
Lays out the subviews for this launcher view.
Update the pager's current page based on the scroll view's content offset.
Find a button in the pages and retrieve its page and index.
The amount of padding on each side of the launcher view pages.
The launcher view notifies the delegate of any user interaction or state changes.
The launcher view populates its pages with information from the data source.

The last time this image was accessed.

A network-enabled image view that consumes minimal amounts of memory.
Designated initializer.
Kill any network requests and replace the displayed image with the initial image.
Load an image from the network using the current frame as the display size.
Load an image from the network with a specific display size.
Load an image from the network with a specific display size.
Load an image from the network with a crop rect and the current frame as the display size...

A network request has begun.
The image has been loaded, either from the network or in-memory.

Whether there is an active request for this image view.
Delegate for state change notifications.
A flag for enabling the resizing of images for display.

The image disk cache used by this image view to store the image on disk.

The maximum amount of time that an image will stay in memory after the request completes.
The lifetime for an image stored in the disk cache.
The image view delegate used to inform of state changes.
The image has begun an asynchronous download of the image.
The image has completed an asynchronous download of the image.
The asynchronous download failed.
For hashing raw data.
Calculate an md5 hash using CC_MD5.
Calculate the SHA1 hash using CC_SHA1.
For manipulating NSStrings.
Determines if the string contains only whitespace and newlines.
Calculates the height of this text given the font, max width, and line break mode.
Parses a URL query string into a dictionary where the values are arrays.
Parses a URL, adds query parameters to its query, and re-encodes it as a new URL.
Compares two strings expressing software versions.
Calculate the md5 hash using CC_MD5.
Calculate the SHA1 hash using CommonCrypto CC_SHA1.
